options.title: -c count
options.description: Repeat the display count times. The first display is for the time since a reboot and each subsequent report is for the time period since the last display. If no wait interval is specified, the default is 1 second.

options.title: -f
options.description: Report on the number of fork(2), __tfork(3), and vfork(2) system calls as well as kernel thread creations since system startup, and the number of pages of virtual memory involved in each.

options.title: -i
options.description: Report on the number of interrupts taken by each device since system startup.

options.title: -M core
options.description: Extract values associated with the name list from the specified core instead of the running kernel.

options.title: -m
options.description: Report on the usage of kernel dynamic memory listed first by size of allocation and then by type of usage.

options.title: -N system
options.description: Extract the name list from the specified system instead of the running kernel.

options.title: -s
options.description: Display the contents of the uvmexp structure (see uvm_init(9)), giving the total number of several kinds of paging related events which have occurred since system startup.

options.title: -t
options.description: Report on the number of page in and page reclaims since system startup, and the amount of time required by each.

options.title: -w wait
options.description: Pause wait seconds between each display. If no repeat count is specified, the default is infinity.

options.title: -z
options.description: When used with -i, also list devices which have not yet generated an interrupt.
